item.title: Qt - Microwave
item.description: Qt Lab#3 : Statecharts Source code: https://github.com/winsa24/-QT-Microwave Introduction I implement the presentation and interaction control panel of a microwave oven on Qt. 1. Design the Statechart 2. Graphical interface In this part, I created a graphical interface by dragging and dropping based on Qt Designor. I used QLineEdit and QDial as display panel and slider. 3. Implement In this part, I first implement the QtStateMachine according to the Statechart shown in the first section. I created 9 states and use state->addTransition() to link different states with different buttons.
